Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand face Bangladesh in ODI 11 of the ongoing 2023 World Cup, in Chennai on Friday.
New Zealand are currently unbeaten, having defeated England and Netherlands in their previous matches.
Bangladesh began their campaign with a six-wicket win vs Afghanistan but lost their next fixture against England by 137 runs.
New Zealand are currently second in the 10-team standings with four points from two games, while Bangladesh are sixth with two points from two matches.
A win will be crucial for both sides and fans are expecting a thrilling encounter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: In ODI World Cup history, New Zealand have faced Bangladesh in five matches and have clinched victory in all of those matches.
New Zealand broke Bangladesh's long-standing home winning streak in ODIs last month, when they clinched a 2-0 series win in Dhaka.
